CustomField.description: If question has the option of "N/A" it is given maximum score
CustomField.formula:
CASE( Name_Given_Analyst__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Name_Used_Customers__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( If_non_Community_User_setup__c , "Yes", 8, "No", 0,8)+ CASE( If_non_Community_User_Walkthrough__c , "Yes", 8, "No", 0,8)+ CASE( Understood_the_Priority_and_Impact__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Has_the_Analyst_Listened__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Sounding_Confident_Positive_Words__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Have_we_sounded_empathetic_built_rapport__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Collecting_appropriate_details_Open_Q_s__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Hold_Mute_Appropriate_Use__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Reference_to_Portal_Community__c , "Yes", 8, "No", 0,8)+ CASE( Ensured_the_customer_Understands__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Summarised_Issue_Solution_Next_Steps__c , "Yes", 6, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Use_of_Names_Analyst_Customer__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Case_Reference_Provided__c , "Yes", 8, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Mention_of_Survey__c , "Yes", 6, "No", 0,6)+ CASE( Offer_of_Further_Help__c , "Yes", 8, "No", 0,0)+
VALUE( TEXT ( Professional_Introduction__c ))+ VALUE( TEXT ( Is_Customer_confident_of_resolution__c ))+ VALUE( TEXT ( Did_analyst_adapt_style_to_suit_customer__c ))+ VALUE( TEXT ( Have_we_answered_the_question__c ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If question has the option of "N/A" it is given maximum score
CustomField.label: Score (Call)
